name: Mylee Ejercito
text: I'm against the burial because I think many, many people cannot compartmentaliz e. That the burial will be used as propaganda by the Marcos machine to catapult BBM to the presidency in 2022. Kaya rin although I'm protesting, I also want to think about concrete ways we can combat the misinformation and propaganda that's out there.
